subject: A familar voice?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Starts out "List-en----" sounded exact;ly like the voice from the Sony
"this is meant to post...". I have the recorder feeding an amplified speaker
while recording. That's why I call the main speaker on the boxes the monitor
speaker.
